body.name: REOLINK Outdoor Security Camera, Home Security Camera System for 5MP PoE IP Surveillance, Human/Vehicle Detection, Work with Smart Home, Time-Lapse, Up to 256GB microSD Card, RLC-520A (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 48 mins
features: Smart Human/Vehicle Detection: Backed by smart motion detection technology, this PoE IP camera can identify people and vehicles among all movements. Get real-time alerts when a suspicious person or car is loitering around your house or store and check them on the live feed or the Playback via Reolink software.

Exceptional 5MP Super HD and Sound Recording: Boasting a high resolution of 2560x1920 at 30 fps, the RLC-520A security IP camera can capture crystal clear video with vivid details. With the built-in microphone, it also picks up ambient sound for an extra layer of security.

Time-Lapse to See the Day in a Minute: This surveillance camera supports to record time-lapse videos. You can keep tracking of your 3D printing, see the whole construction process in a few minutes, or capture beautiful views from sunrise to sunset. It is easy to use and fun to share with friends. (Time lapse only works on Reolink App.)

Easy PoE Installation: This PoE camera uses a single Ethernet cable to transmit both data and power. Simplified wiring means easier and clean installation. Plug-and-Play reliable connection for DIY enthusiasts. NOTE: power supply is not included.

Flexible Recording Options: The surveillance camera supports 24/7 continuous recording when movement is detected or during a scheduled time. Videos can be saved in the microSD card (up to 256GB, not included), Reolink NVR, or FTP server. Choose a way you prefer and enjoy customized security.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 389 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: These IP cameras capture 5MP HD videos at 30fps, therefore bringing an ultra-crisp and detailed on-screen experience that makes every detail vivid and inescapable. With advanced 3D-DNR and IR technology, the cameras are capable of capturing stable and sharp night vision up to 100ft.

Important Notes: With the power from IEEE802.3af PoE switch/injector/DC 12V power adapter(Not included), you could set up and access the cameras via Reolink App, Reolink PC client, or web browser (Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Safari).Reolink NVRs with the hardware version of N7MB01/N6MB01/N5MB01/H3MB18/N3MB01/N2MB02 under the latest firmware version support the smart detection/playback for the RLC-520A. You can verify the compatibility via the System Information of the NVR.Third-party NVR is NOT supported. We recommend Reolink software/NVR for the best performance.

Flexible Recording Options These security cameras can optionally record 24/7 or motion-triggered videos to a microSD card (up to 256GB, not included), Reolink NVR, FTP server, or NAS system. Let the Reolink security cameras help you save the key moments and keep them safe. Instant Motion Alerts Once these surveillance security cameras detect something suspicious, they will immediately send you a push notification and an email alert with a picture/video attachment. This helps you stay in the know of the important events happening on your property. Multi-Users Access by Reolink Software Try to quickly filter videos by person/vehicle events via intuitive Reolink App/Client, then locate the moments you need by the timeline, all within a few clicks. Each camera supports up to 12 users using different devices to live stream simultaneously (with 2 mainstreams & 10 substreams).

PoE: All-in-One Solution for Home Security Utilizing PoE technology, the RLC-520A can load 5MP HD images in unmatched stability under high bitrates. These surveillance cameras use one single cable (Up to 330ft via CAT6,7 cable) to transmit both data and power, also save you the trouble from the instability of wireless network. Timelapse: Capture Dynamic Process Use these security cameras to record time-lapse videos. Keep track of your 3D printing, see the whole construction process in a few minutes, or capture beautiful views from sunrise to sundown. It allows you to capture the dynamic processes vividly and visually. (Timelapse only works on Reolink App) Work With Smart Home It can’t be easier to control home security cameras that work with sound demand. Just tell your smart device to show you the cameras, and you’ll see live feeds from the cameras on your Chromecast-enabled TVs. No further subscription or fee will be needed for this function. Waterproof Design, No Worry for Elements With a metal rugged enclosure, these security cameras are designed to withstand any harsh weather conditions. Even under torrential downpours or scorching sun, they stay safe and sound. Working Temperature: -10°C - +55°C (14°F - 131°F) Humidity: 10% - 90%Weatherproof: IP67

Specifications for the 5MP@30FPS RLC-520A Image Sensor 1/2.7" CMOS Sensor Video Resolution 2560 x 1920 (5.0 Megapixels) at 30 frames/sec Lens f=4.0mm fixed, F=2.0, with IR Cut Night Vision 30 Meters (100 ft) Power Supply PoE: IEEE 802.3af, 48V Active; DC Power: DC 12.0V⎓1A, <12W Weatherproof IP67 Cable Supported Up to 270ft CAT5(5e), up to 330ft CAT6, and CAT7 Ethernet cables with T-568B connectors and 8 PIN Browser Supported Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Safari OS Supported PC: Windows, Mac OS; Smartphone: iOS, Android Smart Alarm Motion detection/Human detection/Vehicle detection Field of View Horizontal: 80° Vertical: 42° Compatible Reolink NVR Hw. N7MB01/N6MB01/N5MB01/H3MB18/N3MB01/N2MB02 under the latest firmware version

RLC-510A Black RLC-520A(2.8mm) RLC-810A RLC-823A Doorbell PoE RLK8-410B4-5MP Recording 24/7 or Motion Detection to microSD card(Not included) or Reolink PoE NVRs 24/7 or Motion Detection to microSD card(Not included) or Reolink PoE NVRs 24/7 or Motion Detection to microSD card(Not included) or Reolink PoE NVRs 24/7 or Motion Detection to microSD card(Not included) or Reolink PoE NVRs 24/7 or Motion Detection to microSD card(Not included) or Reolink PoE NVRs 24/7 or Motion Detection to built-in 2TB HDD Zoom Digital Zoom Digital Zoom Digital Zoom 5X Optical Zoom Digital Zoom Digital Zoom Viewing Angle Horizontal: 80° Vertical: 42° Horizontal: 100° Vertical: 75° Diagonal: 130° Horizontal: 87° Vertical: 44° Horizontal 96°-27° Vertical: 69°-21 Horizontal: 134°, Vertical: 97, Diagonal: 180° Horizontal: 80° Vertical: 42° Detection Algorithm Human/Vehicle Detection Human/Vehicle/Pet Detection Human/Vehicle Detection Human/Vehicle/Pet Detection Human Detection Human/Vehicle Detection Lens f=4mm/F2.0 f=2.8mm/F2.0 f=4.0mm fixed f=2.7-13.5mm/Max. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you need a camera in a location, but dont need fancy zooms or PTZ this is an excellent choice. Got mine for like $40 each.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had nothing but great performance from all of the REOLINK cameras I’ve bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great outdoor cameras! Well made, easy to install and a great surveillance system all together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use cameras, excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I bought two cameras last year and had to use silicone adhesive to glue the camera into position. I should have just contacted customer service because they replaced both cameras after I finally said something. Their customer service is excellent and they stand behind their products. These cameras are very easy to setup and use. The app makes it super simple.The mounts could hold the cameras a little more firmly, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cameras are good, image is bad.
reviews.reviewText: They need a different image that better reflects that there are 2 different things in this picture. But cameras are crisp and clear. I have about 40 and counting. I abandoned my entire lorex system in favor of these beauties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this camera
reviews.reviewText: I have several products from reolink and I have liked them all. I like the quality on this particular camera and its easy to setup. I have had these cameras for several years, they work just as well as the first day I got them and so I ordered more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't go wrong with Reolink!
reviews.reviewText: I've had multiple Reolink NVR's, and dozens of Reolink cameras. They've always worked quite well and have been rock solid. The smart identification features are nice, allowing you to see triggered motion alerts based on what the camera saw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely washed out
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality on these is absolutely garbage in the sunlight and mediocre otherwise. I bought a 2 pack and they're both the same so I know it isn't just a one off problem. There's no adjustment for contrast, at least in the app. The object detection works but that's pretty useless if you can't identify the vehicle or person.I'll be sending these back unless I can find a way to improve the image qualityEDIT: The washout was caused by the anti-flicker being set to "other". Setting it to 60Hz fixed it and the cameras are working great now
Easy to install, and use. Provide clear and accurate pictures. Delivery on time. Installed as surveillant around the house.
Came really quickly and happy with the quality of product
